explanation: The air map of the area is the most crucial item for our survival as it will provide us with vital information about our surroundings and potential resources. With the map, we can plot a course towards the nearest settlement or find a source of water. It can also help us avoid potential dangers such as hazardous terrain or extreme weather conditions. Additionally, the map can guide us in identifying any nearby rescue operations or signal points for help. Overall, having the air map increases our chances of making informed decisions and effectively navigating our way to safety in this challenging environment.
